About Me

I'm a full-stack software developer based in Nairobi, Kenya. And i'm passionate about learning, programming, writing and travelling.

HoodWatch

An application that allows you to be in the loop about everything happening in your neighborhood. From contact information of different handyman to meeting announcements or even alerts.

Wanderer Blog

An app where travellers and travellers at heart can share tips on places they've been to and their experiences.

Awwwards

An application like Awwards, that allows a user to post a project he/she has created and get it reviewed by his/her peers.
